Package controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
This is the native scripting API for IdleRSC.

      Picks up the item at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x -
      y -
      itemId -
      reachable - -- whether or not you can stand on top of the item. Set to false if the item is on a table.
      async - -- whether or not to block when walking to the item. If set to true, it will keep attempting to walk to the item, until it is close enough to pick it up.

    • sleepHandler

      public void sleepHandler(int fatigueToSleepAt, boolean quitOnNoSleepingBag)
      If fatigue is greater or equal to `fatigueToSleepAt`, this will commence the sleep process and IdleRSC will fill in the answer from the OCR. Has no effect on Coleslaw.
      Parameters:
      fatigueToSleepAt - -- fatigue to sleep at. Must be between 1 and 100.
      quitOnNoSleepingBag - -- whether or not to logout and stop the script if no sleeping bag is present. If no sleeping bag is present and this is false, this function has no effect.

    • getBlockingNpcServerIndex

      public int getBlockingNpcServerIndex(int npcId)
      Returns the server index of the NPC which is currently blocking you. Useful for scripts where an NPC blocking you is bad. Only works if your character is facing the NPC directly.
      Parameters:
      npcId - -- necessary because you don't want to accidentally attack the wrong npc.
      Returns:
      the NPC's server index. returns -1 on no NPC blocking.

      y -
      Returns:
